title: Credit card dues and defaulters on the rise
description: Credit card dues and defaulters are rising, with defaulters reaching 1.8% in June. Outstanding credit card debt has grown significantly, stressing the unsecured lending segment. Young millennials are heavily using credit limits and defaulting without revolving loans. The RBI's proactive measures have helped reduce credit growth in unsecured segments.
